en_us: Perfect for UHCs, this module forces you to balance protection with speed.
Helious hinders weighted armour, allowing users to wear more armour without slowing down.

The Helious Shamir is found on Aluminium Bands. It can be placed onto armour.\n\nEach Helious piece will reduce weighted armour by one slowness level. Too little of weight will cause levitation and wither effects.
Perfect for UHCs, this module forces you to balance protection with speed.
Users will be slowed down based on how much armour they have on.
The weight is purely based on how much armor one has on. Slowness III is applied for full armor points.
